code:
// Auth.js
export var BASE_URL="https://auth.nomoreparties.co";export var register=function register(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(res){console.log("REGISTER");console.log(res);res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var authorize=function authorize(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){if(data.token){localStorage.setItem("jwt",data.token);return data;}}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var getContent=function getContent(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:"GET",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){return data;});};
